title: Monitoring - Printer Offline Alert
description: An RMM alert indicates that a client's main office printer is offline.

tasks.description: Attempt to ping the printer's IP address.
Contact the client's office manager to ask them to perform a physical check.
tasks.expected_outcome: The office manager reports the printer is jammed and has an error on its screen.

tasks.description: Guide the office manager to clear the paper jam and power cycle the printer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The printer comes back online, and the alert is cleared.
